name: Easy Peasy Waffles
preparation: Place Waffle Mold on Sheet Pan and generously oil.
In a large bowl,  whisk mix with egg, milk, oil, and vanilla extract. Let batter rest 5 min; it will continue to thicken.
Divide batter evenly between molds. Smooth tops as best you can. Bake for 13—15 min or until tops are golden.
When cool to the touch, flip pan and gently remove waffles. Add toppings, if desired.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 3⁄4 cup plain 2% Greek yogurt and 1 cup berries.

products.name: Pancake & Waffle Mix (Pack of 3)
summary: Stack ‘em up: It’s time to make the fluffiest pancakes and waffles ever! Add a few simple ingredients to this gluten free mix and griddle, flip, or press your way through an easy and delicious breakfast.

products.name: Sheet Pan
summary: Lightweight all-purpose baking sheet made from a single piece of aluminum, with a one-inch rim.
